title: Find-Participles
code: # Participles - ed target_ed <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_participles(character_words, type = "ed"))   # Participles - ing target_ing <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_participles(character_words, type = "ing"))

title: Find-Structures
code: # Of target_of <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "of"))  # IF Conditions & Unless target_if <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = c("if", "unless")))  # That target_that <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "that"))  # When target_when <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "when"))  # Which target_which <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "which"))  # What else target_whatelse <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = "what else"))  # Would target_would <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = c("would", "'d")))  target_would <- transcripts_atla %>% filter(find_structure(character_words, word = c("would like", "'d like", "would love", "'d love")))
